R

readNextKV() - Method in class mapr.io.KVReader
Parses a new line from the input file, and splits it to a (k,v) pair (with v possibly null).
readNextRecord() - Method in class mapr.io.RecordReader
Parses a new line from the input record chunk (if available), and splits it to a (k,v) pair (with v possibly null).
RecordReader - Class in mapr.io
Used by Mappers to read specific records efficiently by jumping to calculated file offets.
RecordReader(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class mapr.io.RecordReader
Initialize a RecordReader based on the parameters on the chunk of records.
reduce(String, Iterator<String>) - Method in class mapr.examples.GrepReducer
For each token (key) in the intermediate file, return n times of the key itself, where n is the number of the times it appears in the intermediate files.
reduce(String, Iterator<String>) - Method in class mapr.examples.WordCountReducer
For each token (key), simply add up its corresponding values, and emit the (token, sum) pair.
reduce(String, Iterator<String>) - Method in class mapr.tasks.Reducer
User's rule for reducing a list of values associated with a same key.
Reducer - Class in mapr.tasks
Abstract class for Reducer that users can extend based on the MapReduce job.
